section.heading: Notice of amount of tax payable—Contents

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.50 > Section 82.50.460 82.50.440 << 82.50.460 >> 82.50.520 PDF RCW 82.50.460 Notice of amount of tax payable — Contents. Prior to the end of any registration year of a vehicle, the director shall cause to be mailed to the owners of travel trailers or campers, of record, notice of the amount of tax payable during the succeeding registration year. The notice shall contain a legal description of the travel trailer or camper, prominent notice of due dates, and such other information as may be required by the director. [ 1979 c 123 s 3 ; 1975 1st ex.s. c 118 s 17 ; 1971 ex.s. c 299 s 61 .] NOTES: Reviser's note: See note following RCW 82.50.010 . Effective date — Severability — 1975 1st ex.s. c 118: See notes following RCW 46.16A.020 .
